stem:
A 62-year-old man was diagnosed with type 2 Diabetes Mellitus with a BMI of 33 kg/m2. Lifestyle modifications have failed to control blood.

His investigation findings are as follows. 
Urea: 3.6mmol/l
Creatinine: 89mmol/l

What is the next appropriate management?
disc: In an obese patient who has failed to obtain good glycemic control with dietary and lifestyle modifications, the initial treatment of choice is biguanides.
